page.title: 04TRADE GILWERN'S MAIN STREET
page.content: Gilwern's Main Street is 280 metres in length.It accomodates 32 public services including inns,car park,a guest house and many shops.The largest building incorporates a music shop,hairdressers,an Estate Agent,an opticians and a solicitors.Next to that is a chemists shop.Their best selling product is medicine.Next to the chemists is the surgery.The surgery doesn't sell anything, but issues prescriptions.Next to the surgery is the newsagents run by Mr. Morris, their best selling product being items of confectionery. There is also a tea shop, which sells hot and cold snacks and drinks.Also there is an Outdoor Pursuits Centre, where you can hire various gear for such activities as climbing,caving, sailing and canoeing.The Main Street also has two chapels,a bank and a post office.
